title: Lily: The Witch Hunter Omnibus Edition
description: Witches. Vampires. Werewolves. Demons.Moving to Salem introduces Lily Mauve to a whole new world, one she is in the centre of. If making new friends and falling in love isn't enough, there's also the fact she's a witch.A witch destined to be a triple goddess and defeat the man who has hunted her kind for over three hundred years.Faced with heartbreak, never-ending family secrets, lies and betrayal, she must stand strong and be the leader everyone knows she can be. Lily thinks the war will end in Salem, because destroying Henry Luther is her birthright, isn't it?
author: Emma  Hart
